title: GenAI Intern
mission: As our GenAI Intern, you will work closely with the product and engineering teams to prototype, test, and refine AI-driven features, gaining hands-on experience with large language models and applied machine learning in a fast-moving startup environment.

must: Basic knowledge of large language models (LLMs) or transformers
Experience with at least one ML/AI library (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face)
Ability to run experiments and analyze results
nice: Previous internship or project experience in AI/ML
Knowledge of prompt engineering and fine-tuning techniques
Familiarity with APIs and web application development
Basic cloud experience (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Interest in human-computer interaction and product design
Coursework or research experience in NLP, CV, or GenAI

responsibilities: Support the design and testing of AI-powered product features
Run small-scale experiments with LLMs and report findings
Assist in building prototypes and demos for internal and customer use
Document learnings, results, and best practices
Collaborate with engineers and designers to align AI features with user needs
Contribute to research on new techniques in generative AI and machine learning
